alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hot Spring; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 1:13PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Grant, south central Saline and northeastern Hot Spring Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 111 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Prattsville, or 8 miles west of Sheridan, moving northwest at 30 mph. Given this environment, a brief small tornado could be possible with this storm. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Malvern... Sheridan... Haskell... Rockport... Traskwood... Tull... Prattsville... Poyen... Perla... Thiel... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Dogwood... Fenter... Gifford... Glen Rose... Buie... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
